msbt.message: I gotta be honestI love celebratin' Lunar New Year, but I've never really been sure what it's about.Then again, gettin' to ring in another New Year? Not gonna turn THAT down, !
I love gettin' to welcome the Lunar New Year with everyone here. It's kinda like one big rock band!
What do you usually do for Lunar New Year? Are you the chill-at-home type, or the get-out-go-nuts type?
A lot of folks do Lunar New Year with their families I oughta send my parents a card or something.
Just 'cause it's Lunar New Year doesn't mean my day's all that different, .I mean, I guess I'm a tiiiiiiiny bit more hyped, and a liiiiiiitle bit more chattybut that's it!
